reviewText:
I love the book and the the

i LOVE THE BOOK AND THE DVD THEY GO TOGATHER, i HAVE WATCH THE DVD TWICE AND  AND HAVE LEARNED WERE I MADE MISTAKES ON MY FIRST SADDLES.

Saddlemaking is a very complex task not something that you are going to learn by reading a book or watching a DVD but the information is very well presented in this set.  It will definitely give you a heads-up if you decide to seek training.
